name: Things That Scare Me
description:
Things That Scare Me is an autobiographical, 3D walking simulator where I, the game designer, narrate the things that scare me and their associated stories. Come and traverse through my sometimes irrationally bad fears while I narrate all the wit I can muster! Come see the abstract retellings of why I very much want to - sometimes - phase out of existence! 

For clarification, this is a demo! The Intro Hub Area and Level One are currently what is available.

Play FULLSCREEN with sound ON.

Press R: To reset the current level.

Press M: To return to the main menu.

Press ESC: To quit the game altogether. Also, for the in-browser version, press ESC to minimize the window.

(FOR NOW: please walk up to the phone and press "X" to pick it up. Also, walk up to the colored doors and press "X" to enter the levels.)
